gesture_get_drag_time: This function is used to get the time it takes for a Drag Start Gesture event to be triggered by a touch or click. This time will also affect how the Tap Event is triggered as a touch/click and release before this time is up will be considered a Tap. The time is measured in seconds and has a default value of 0.16.
The above code checks to see if the drag time for gestures is set to 0.16 seconds and if it is not it sets it to that value.
